entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
